name: market for fuel cell, polymer electrolyte membrane, 2kW electrical, future | fuel cell, polymer electrolyte membrane, 2kW electrical, future | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9506/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'fuel cell, polymer electrolyte membrane, 2kW electrical, future', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is a mobile infrastructure, representing the production of a fuel cell, polymer electrolyte membrane (PEM). It has a 2 kW electrical output, a lifetime operation of 15 years that corresponds to 80,000 h. The process includes the most important building materials, their end-of-life, the energy consumption during production and land use.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'fuel cell, polymer electrolyte membrane, 2kW electrical, future',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'fuel cell, polymer electrolyte membrane, 2kW electrical, future',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
